Chris Carter (born October 13, 1956) is an American writer, director, and producer. He is famous for creating "The X-Files", a popular science fiction television series.
He also created Ten Thirteen Productions, a production company. Ten Thirteen Productions produced the series "The X-Files", "Millenium", "Harsh Realm", and "The Lone Gunmen". He has also produced two feature movies, ' and '.
